name: Malice-in-muirfieland
tagline: A text adventure written in python for school
body:
Welcome to Malice in Muirfieland!
Click Download as Zip to download the game. Check the included User Guide for instructions on how to install the game, as well as how to run and play the game! Have fun!

If you'd like to contribute to the project, press the View on GitHub button to head over to our GitHub page, where you can report bugs and make suggestions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
